description.en: A gunslinger and former Turk under Shinra. He was unethically experimented on、 granting him eternal youth and the ability to shapeshift. Tormented by the mistakes of his past、 he locks himself within a coffin for almost thirty years until being awakened by Cloud and setting out to tie up loose ends.
description.jp:
かつて 神羅の工作部隊「タークス」に
所属していたガンマン。ある人体実験に
より 不老の身体と魔獣への変身能力を
手に入れる。過去の過ちにさいなまれ
棺の中で長年の眠りについていたが
クラウドたちとの出会いを機に目覚め
真実を目の当たりにする。

jp.text: フッ……お前たちにつきあうのも\n悪くはないな
フッ……\n戦いというものを教えてやろう
どうでもいいが\nやり方がスマートではないな……
あんたのその熱さが\nうらやましいよ……
悪夢にうなされる長き眠りこそ\n私に与えられたつぐないの時間

gl.text: It's only a matter of time for us.
Hmm... Being with you all isn't so bad.
Hmph...I'll show them what real fighting is.
I don't care what you're doing、 so much as the idiotic way you're doing it...
I wish I had your go-get-them attitude.
A nightmare? My long sleep has given me time to atone.

rank_up_desc.en: When using [Deadly Beast Flare (C)]:\n• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV\n• [INT BRV Down], [Fire Resist Down] duration +2

・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分
・「初期BRVダウン」「火耐性ダウン」の2ACTION期間延長

desc.en:
5-HIT ranged BRV+HP attack
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
Inflicts [Nightmare] to all enemies for 3 turns
Grants [Implanted Power] for 6 turns

[Nightmare] lowers Defense and deals BRV damage

[Implanted Power] has the following effects:
• Raises Max BRV
• Raises BRV damage dealt based on the number of debuffs inflicted to the target
desc.gl:
5-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
All targets: 3 turns Nightmare
Self: 6 turns Implanted Power
desc.jp:
5HIT遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
ターゲット以外にも50％分のHPダメージ
敵全体に3ACTION「悪夢」付与
自身に6ACTION「植えつけられた力」付与

desc.gl: Nightmare: Lowers DEF; effects a certain amount of BRV damage
desc.jp: 悪夢：防御力が減少し 一定量のBRVダメージが発生する

desc.gl: Implanted Power: Raises MAX BRV; deals greater BRV damage based on number of debuffs afflicting target
desc.jp: 植えつけられた力：最大BRVが上昇し 対象の弱体効果の数に応じて 自身が与えるBRVダメージが上昇する

desc.en:
「Deadly Beast Flare」 use +1

When using 「Deadly Beast Flare」:
- BRV hits becomes AoE
- BRV attack hit count becomes 4
- Tremendously raises its total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Slightly improves the effects of 「Initial BRV Down」 debuff
- Extends the duration of 「Enchant Fire」 by 4 turns
- Lowers Action Delay
- Triggers a single target HP attack after use

When the number of debuffs on target is greater than 3:
- Turns 「Deadly Beast Flare」 into 「Deadly Beast Flare+」
　∟ Moderately raises total potency
　　Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
desc.gl:
Deadly Beast Flare use +1

When using Deadly Beast Flare:
 • Becomes group attack
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 4; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Slight INT BRV Down boost
 • Fire Enchant duration +4
 • Higher turn rate
 • Triggers additional HP attack on target after use

Deadly Beast Flare becomes Deadly Beast Flare+ (moderate BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%) while target afflicted with 3 or more debuffs

・「エンチャント・火」の4ACTION期間延長
・行動負荷ダウン
・使用後 ターゲットに追加HP攻撃が発動

Deadly Beast Flare use +1

Deadly Beast Flare becomes Deadly Beast Flare+ (moderate BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%) while target afflicted with 3 or more debuffs
